title: fps drops and help on how atleast i can run smooth 60 fps
body:
so i am a dia 3 adc main and in teamfights i feel useless becuase i cancel half my autos and cant kite becuase i have 10 fps any help on how i can get better fps here are my pc stats(its not the best :P)
AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core Proccesor 4800+ 2.50 GHZ
RAM 4.0
system type 64 bit
graphic card Nividia geoforce GT 630

replies.body:
Inconsistent FPS can be caused by a number of factors, with problematic graphics drivers and windows power settings being the most frequent. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know the results of those steps.
